# NSTextScalingType.iOS

**Case**

Font sizes throughout the document appear visually similar to how they would render in iOS.

## Declaration

```swift
case iOS
```

## Constants

- **NSTextScalingType.standard**: Font sizes throughout the document appear visually similar to how they would render in macOS and non-Apple platforms.
